NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Intermodal and Reliability or the cell corresponding to Intermodal and Speed?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Intermodal} and {Speed} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Intermodal and Speed or the cell corresponding to Last Mile and Sustainability?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Last Mile} and {Sustainability} has a higher heat value.

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.36 to 0.47?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Air, Efficiency), (Intermodal, Efficiency), (Last Mile, Efficiency), (Maritime, Efficiency), (Pipeline, Efficiency), (Rail, Efficiency), (Road, Efficiency), (Warehousing, Efficiency)}.
